wikipedia_page.main: General William Gustavus Brown (3 February 1809 – 27 November 1883) was Commander of British Troops in China and Hong Kong.

response: * William Gustavus Brown (1809-1883), Jamaican-born general, who commanded British forces in China and Hong Kong
*William Gustavus Brown (died 1883), commander of British troops in China and Hong Kong
*1881–1883:(1st Battalion) Gen. William Gustavus Brown (ex 83rd Foot)
